title: What is Agrify?
answer: Agrify is a technology-driven platform enhancing agriculture in Africa by integrating AI, satellite imagery, and web3 tools. We provide farmers with actionable insights to increase productivity and sustainability. By following our AI-driven advice in local languages and maintaining a high regenerative score, farms can access new revenue streams from companies seeking to offset carbon emissions and international exporters.

title: What are carbon credits?
answer: Carbon credits are tradeable certificates that represent the right to emit a tonne of carbon dioxide or an equivalent amount of another greenhouse gas. At Agrify, our platform helps farmers earn carbon credits by adopting sustainable practices, which they can sell to companies aiming to reduce their carbon footprints. Our carbon credits are blockchain-based and tokenized, ensuring transparency and proof of origin.

title: Is there a free trial available?
answer: Yes, Agrify offers a free trial, providing full access to our platform. This allows farmers and agribusinesses to explore how our AI-driven insights can transform their operations risk-free, helping them see the benefits of our services before committing to a subscription.
